title: Frozen Pulses Flutter
description: 'Frozen Pulses Flutter' is the exciting second entry in the 'Speak Easy, Anne' series. Immediately following the arrest, Anne and Dante are forced to make a major decision. Anne nervously attends the high-profile court proceedings, but she finds that life in general is just as much of a trial. Chris and Betty find themselves in a stalemate, Gil finds his thirst for power growing, and Anne fears she won't be able to navigate the increasingly murky waters between friends and lovers for much longer. Desperate not to lose each other, Anne and Dante try to forge an understanding, but will they be able to?
author: Brandy D. Anderson
